original_text: The young woman was very attractive in appearance, a maiden whom no man had known. She went down to the spring and filled her jar and came up.
korean_text: 그 소녀는 보기에 심히 아리땁고 지금까지 남자가 가까이 하지 아니한 처녀더라 그가 우물로 내려가서 물을 그 물동이에 채워가지고 올라오는지라

sentences.original_text: The young woman was very attractive in appearance
a maiden whom no man had known
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 어떤 남자도 알지 못하는 처녀였습니다

sentences.original_text: She went down to the spring
